entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 12:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -22.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
